---
name: Land Raider Helios
type: AV
speed: 25cm
armour: 4+
cc: 6+
ff: 5+
special_rules:

  - thick-rear-armour
  - transport
notes:
  |
    May transport one infantry unit (except a Terminator unit) without _Jump Packs_ or _Mounted_. Counts as a Land Raider for the purposes of being transported.

    id: twin-lascannon
    multiplier: 2
  -
    id: whirlwind
